name: Mac Pan
description: This game was created for the NHSGA program at CMU and was a recreation of Pac Man. My team and I chose to recreate pac-man as a ninja in a dungeon. The 'first level' is normal pac-man with the ghosts being skulls, pac-man being a ninja aka Mac-pan, and the swords are the power pellets. In the second level it turns dark and there are still swords, but a torch and speed boots are added to help the player. The player then has to find the key and return to the also hidden door to beat the level. It was also made in about 5 days... so relax!
